actions.text: Amendment SA 788 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 788 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Santorum. (consideration:  CR S6895) To make available, with an offset, $3,000,000 for operation and maintenance for the Army Reserve for information operations for Land Forces Readiness-Information Operations Sustainment.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 788 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 788 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Santorum.

purpose: To make available, with an offset, $3,000,000 for operation and maintenance for the Army Reserve for information operations for Land Forces Readiness-Information Operations Sustainment.
